description.value:
You can leap down on your foes with increased ferocity, adding the force of your fall to your strike.

Prerequisites: Base attack bonus +6

Benefit: When you are 10 to 30 feet above an enemy, you can drop down on them and make a melee attack as a standard action. You must end your movement on solid ground in a space adjacent to your foe. You take damage as if you fell the moved distance (@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#falling]{Core Rulebook 400}), but you don’t gain the prone condition. If you hit, you also deal bonus damage equal to your Strength bonus, doubled if you are attacking with a 2-handed melee weapon.
